name: OutputFilter
desc: An encoder-decoder that writes output data to a stream.

items.name: init(FilterOperation, using: Algorithm, bufferCapacity: Int, writingTo: (Data?) -> Void)
items.desc: Creates an output filter that can be used to compress or decompress data.

items.name: func write<D>(D?)
items.desc: Writes data to the output filter.

items.name: func finalize()
items.desc: Finalizes the stream by flushing all the remaining data in the stream.
